combatsystem¶

class combatsystem.CombatSystem(event_manager, world)[source]¶

Handles collision between characters and projectiles etc.

Attributes:
  • event_manager (events.EventManager): event manager
  • world (gameWorld.GameWorld): game world contains entities
notify(event)[source]¶

Notify, when event occurs.

Parameters:event (events.Event) – occured event
update()[source]¶

Update all particle emitters and remove dead objects
